java/liquibase/util/StringUtils.java

00001 package liquibase.util;
00002 
00003 import java.util.ArrayList;
00004 import java.util.Collection;
00005 import java.util.List;
00006 
00010 public class StringUtils {
00011     public static String trimToEmpty(String string) {
00012         if (string == null) {
00013             return "";
00014         }
00015         return string.trim();
00016     }
00017 
00018     public static String trimToNull(String string) {
00019         if (string == null) {
00020             return null;
00021         }
00022         String returnString = string.trim();
00023         if (returnString.length() == 0) {
00024             return null;
00025         } else {
00026             return returnString;
00027         }
00028     }
00029     
00037     public static String[] processMutliLineSQL(String multiLineSQL,boolean stripComments) {
00038         
00039         String stripped = stripComments ? stripComments(multiLineSQL) : multiLineSQL;
00040         return splitSQL(stripped);
00041     }
00042 
00046     public static String[] splitSQL(String multiLineSQL) {
00047         return multiLineSQL.split(";\\s*\n|;$|\n[gG][oO]\\s*\n|\n[Gg][oO]$");
00048     }
00049     
00058     public static String stripComments(String multiLineSQL) {
00059         String strippedSingleLines = multiLineSQL.replaceAll("\\s--\\s.*", "");
00060         return strippedSingleLines.replaceAll("/\\*[\n\\S\\s]*\\*/", "\n");
00061     }
00062 
00063     public static String join(Collection<String> collection, String delimiter) {
00064         if (collection == null) {
00065             return null;
00066         }
00067 
00068         if (collection.size() == 0) {
00069             return "";
00070         }
00071         
00072         StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
00073         for (String val : collection) {
00074             buffer.append(val).append(delimiter);
00075         }
00076 
00077         String returnString = buffer.toString();
00078         return returnString.substring(0, returnString.length()-delimiter.length());
00079     }
00080 
00081     public static List<String> splitAndTrim(String s, String regex) {
00082         if (s == null) {
00083             return null;
00084         }
00085         List<String> returnList = new ArrayList<String>();
00086         for (String string : s.split(regex)) {
00087             returnList.add(string.trim());
00088         }
00089 
00090         return returnList;
00091 
00092 
00093     }
00094 }
